entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Saint Andrews
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:51 a.m. ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending near midnight then clearing. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 7. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
